channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）
channel.description: Games whose Steam store page just went public (detected)

item.title: Toilet Battle Hero - Throbbing Gym（新規追加）
item.description: Challenge the strongest opponents in the stadium! Unlock a new sports arena and 5 athletic characters to feel the heat of the match.
item.content:encoded:
Challenge the strongest opponents in the stadium! Unlock a new sports arena and 5 athletic characters to feel the heat of the match.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: My Egg Girls: A Gentle Story~ Demo（新規追加）
item.description: A romance & emotion-raising simulation ADV powered by Emotion. Spend 100 days with Yukino and Rinne—girls born from mysterious eggs—and guide this visual novel to a Happy, Normal, or Bitter ending through your choices and their shifting feelings.
item.content:encoded:
A romance & emotion-raising simulation ADV powered by Emotion. Spend 100 days with Yukino and Rinne—girls born from mysterious eggs—and guide this visual novel to a Happy, Normal, or Bitter ending through your choices and their shifting feelings.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Oni-no-Kuni: Miozuki's Descent（新規追加）
item.description: Miozuki is transported to another world, where she joins forces with Kureha, a fox shrine maiden, and Shizuna, a kunoichi, to fight against powerful foes and save the suffering people. Thus begins a thrilling and shameful adventure in a Japanese-style fantasy world!
item.content:encoded:
Miozuki is transported to another world, where she joins forces with Kureha, a fox shrine maiden, and Shizuna, a kunoichi, to fight against powerful foes and save the suffering people. Thus begins a thrilling and shameful adventure in a Japanese-style fantasy world!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Toilet Battle Hero - Neon Spire Tower（新規追加）
item.description: Challenge the city’s heights! Unlock a new skyscraper nightscape and 5 urban-style characters to start your next rock-paper-scissors adventure.
item.content:encoded:
Challenge the city’s heights! Unlock a new skyscraper nightscape and 5 urban-style characters to start your next rock-paper-scissors adventure.

Steamでページを開く
